name: What is this? A picture puzzle game
name_original: What is this? A picture puzzle game
description:
This is a picture puzzle game in which you have to click the tiles 
on the screen to see what the picture is.
The letters in the bottom can also give you a clue as to what the pic
should be.

A combination word and picture game which is fun and challenging.
The less tiles you click the higher the score.
Hints are enabled.
